SHORT-URL.TITLE: How to shortern your URL?
SHORT-URL.EXPLANATION: Simply paste your long URL into the input box and click "Shorten". You'll get a short link in seconds.

ADVANTAGE-1.TITLE: Enhance User Experience
ADVANTAGE-1.EXPLANATION: Shortened URLs are easier to remember and type, which is especially useful for marketing campaigns and sharing links where space is limited. Their concise format helps ensure that links fit well in social media posts, text messages, and other constrained spaces, while also improving user experience by making URLs more manageable and visually appealing.

ADVANTAGE-2.TITLE: Improve Aesthetics
ADVANTAGE-2.EXPLANATION: Shortened URLs are easier to remember and type, which is beneficial for marketing campaigns and sharing links in space-limited contexts. They simplify the inclusion of links in social media posts, text messages, and other constrained spaces, improving both usability and visual appeal.

ADVANTAGE-3.TITLE: Facilitate Sharing
ADVANTAGE-3.EXPLANATION: Long and complex URLs can be cumbersome to share, especially on platforms with character limits like Twitter. Shortened URLs offer a more streamlined alternative, making it easier to include them in messages and posts. Their brevity not only helps in adhering to character restrictions but also improves readability and reduces the likelihood of errors when typing or copying links.
